unnormalised: Boro, tumi Bharatak bhonvddi korcheak yevzon kortat, khub borem! Punn tumi apleleo pishvyobhorun teaag ani samoshean khatir toiar zanvche adim, ek mhotvachi vostu vixim uloum-ia: tumchea bhonvddi kagd patranik kramaan dovornni. Khas korun te trasdikaaree booking reference numbers, PNRs ani teo soglleo ankiaksharachem codes je achanak tumchi jeevon rekha zatat. Mhojeecher visvas dovora, hem samzun gheun Mumbai local peak houran chalaunek poros soppe asa.
normalised: Borem, tumi Bharotak bhonvddechi ioznni kortat, khub bore! Punn tumchi tol'li bhorchea adim ani kom'modd chha ani samosa khatir toiar ravchea adim, ek mukh'y vostu vixim uloum-ia: tumchim bhonvddek lagpi kagotpotranchem vevosthapon korop. khas korun, tim asvosth korpi buking reforens nombor, P-N-Ar-s, ani her soglle alfanumerik kodd zo kiteak ekdom tumcho jivo doriacho vell zatat. Mhojem manun ghe, him somzop mumboi lokl bhidd bhirddechea vellar cholchea poros soddem asa.

unnormalised: Pehleant, PNR mhunnje kitee? PNR mhunnje Passenger Name Record. Tem 10 ankiaksharanchem code (ABC12D3EFG bhaxen) tumi flight vo railgaddi ticket book kortana tumka dita. Tem tumchem svotaachem booking ID mhunn chinta. Tem tumchea sogllea bhonvddecho vivrak zoddlelem asta: tumchem nanv, flight/railgaddi number, bhonvddichi tarik, seat number (jar confirm zalea), ani tumchea jevnachem pasond (jar tumchea bhagyan aslea!). Tumka hem sadharan tumchea e-ticketacher chaplelem mellta vo SMSan ullekh kel’lo asta.
normalised: Poilem, P-N-Ar mhonnje kitem? P-N-Ar mhonnllear posenjor nem rekordd. hem dho onki alfanumerik kodd (A-B-C-ek-don-D-tin-E-F-G bhaxen) tumi zonn ek uddean vo rel ttokett bukk kortat tedna tumkam ditat. Tumchi vyoktigot buking ai-ddi mhonn chintat. Tem tumchea sogllea bhonvddechea vivranam lagim zoddlam: tumchem namv, uddean/rel nombor, bhonvddechi tarik, bosecho nombor (zori nirntor kel'lo zalear), ani tumchi jevnnechi ruchicho-i (zori tumi itle bhagivont asalear!). Hem tumkam sadharonnponnim tumchea i-ttoketticher chhapil'lem melltta vo tumkam buking kelya uprant mellpi Es-Em-Esan ul'lekh kel'lo asta.

unnormalised: Magir asa booking reference number. Kednaik hem PNR bhaxen vaportat, khas korun flights khatir. Punn, airlines thoddi veglee paddhat vaprunko xakta. Fokot chit divn dovora kiteem-i aksharan ani ankdean melloun kellem dista; tem thodde asunk xakta. Bharotee railgaddyan, tumka PNR sangata transaction ID mellunk xakta, khas korun tumi online IRCTC zariye kelam zalear. Tem TXN1234567890 bhaxen disunk xakta. Hem chodd korun tumchea adharachem asunk zata jar duddvan somasyo asa zalear.
normalised: Uprant buking reforens nombor asa. Kednaim, hem P-N-Ar lagim bodlon vaporta, khas korun uddeankhatir. Punn, eorollainchyo kampniyo-i thoravek vegllichi pod'dot vaprunk xoktat. Fokot akxoram ani onnkam asl'leank dixtti dovrat; tem prarombhik toran tem zatlem. Bharoti rellvint, tumkam P-N-Ar lagim ek tronjekshon ai-ddi-i mellonk xokta, khas korun tumi ai-Ar-Si-Ti-Si vorvim onllain bukk kelear. Tem T-eks-En-ek-don-tin-char-ponch-so-sat-att-nou-xuny bhaxen dista. Hem chodd korun tumchea dhonm vixim somsea zalear tumchea reforensakhatir asta.

unnormalised: Hem kiteak mhotvachem? Boro, survaatek tumka tumchee bookingchem sthiti online choddounk zai. MakeMyTrip vo IRCTC sarkhillem website tumchea ticketachem vivrak haddunk tumchem PNR magta. Ekdum upyogi zatam bhonvdde adim thodde dis sogllem borem asa mhunn confirm korunk. Toxech, jar tumchi flight uxer zata (kiteak soglem sach sanglear, uxer ghoddtta), tumka tumchem PNR rebook korunk vo nuksaan bhorpayechi vinanti korunk zai.
normalised: him kiteak mhotvachim? Borem, survek, tumkam tumchea bukingochi sthiti onllain chek korpak tankanchi goroz asta. MekiMaiTrip vo Ai-Ar-Si-Ti-Si sarkheo vebsaitt tumchea ttokettiche vivron upolbdh korpak tumcho P-N-Ar magtat. Tumi bhonvddek vochchea adim sogllem vevosthit asa kai na tem nirntor korpak khub upiogachem. Toxench, tumchi uddeanchi vell tharail'lea vellar na zalear (kiteak, sodanch der zata), tumkam novean bukk korpak vo nukosann magpak tumchea P-N-Ar-chi goroz poddttli.

unnormalised: Ani tumka tumchea bookingan bodlaav koruncheak zai zalear, bhaxen seat bodalchek vo unchlea vorgak upgrade korunk? Tumkan suchona aasa, PNR soddvonnek lagta! Customer service agent tumchea bookingachem vivran cholun aani zai te bodlaav korunk magtat. Te tumchem ticket number magunk xaktat, ek lamb ankdeacho dhago sarkhem 123-4567890123.
normalised: Ani tumkam tumchea bukingon bodol korche aslear, tumchi boski bodlunk vo unchlea vorgant unnet korunk zai? tumi bodonuk ghetlam, P-N-Ar pod'doti khatir! gostomor servisantlo monis tumchea bukingichem vivron melloun gorjeche bodol korpak tankam techim vortovn ditlo. Taka tumchea ttokettiche nombor, ek sadharonn lamb onnkanchi volleri ji ek-don-tin-ddesh-char-ponch-so-sat-att-nou-xuny-ek-don-tin bhaxen asta ti-i magonk zatat.

unnormalised: Tumchem e-ticket harovllam? Tras naka ghenk! Zori tumchea kodden tumchem PNR vo booking reference number asa zalear, tumi tem sadharan airline vo bhonvddi agentaache website-acher meloun ghenk xaktat. Chodd airlineschea website-acher "Manage Booking" vo "Check PNR Status" mhunn section aasan zatan tumi tumchem PNR ani nimnnem nanv choloun tumchem bookingacho cholun ghenk xaktat.
normalised: tumchem i-ttokett gum zalam? Bhinyechem karonn na! Zori tumchea kodden tumcho P-N-Ar vo buking reforens nombor asa zalear, tumi sadharonnponnim tem eorollain vo provas ejenson melloun gheunk xoktat. Choddxea eorollainchea vebsaittancher "mennej buking" vo "chek P-N-Ar stetus" vibhag asa zaka tumi tumcho P-N-Ar ani nimnhem namv tumchem buking melloun gheunk ghalunk xoktat.

unnormalised: Atam, bus bhonvdde vixim ekhadem utor. Bus ticketache confirm korop eka "Ticket ID" vo eka "Booking ID" zaka sadharan ankdaachem code 987654321 sarkhem yetolem. Hem ek PNR bhaxench ud’desh karta tumka tumchea bookingacher nodor dovornnek ani zai zalear adhar cholun ghennk.
normalised: Atam bos provasan vixim ek utor. bos ttokettichem nirntoronn ek "ttokett ai-ddi" vo ek "buking ai-ddi" lagim ionk xokta, sadharonnponnim onnkanchi volleri no-att-sat-so-ponch-char-tin-don-ek bhaxen. Hem P-N-Ar sarkhem ud'dex kortta, tumkam tumchem buking ttrek korpak ani zori goroz aslear sohakar melloupak ut'tejon dita.

unnormalised: Ugddaas dovortaa ki antrashtree bhonvdde khatir, airlines tankanche svotaache flight codes astat, sadharan don akshara ani magir ankdea ( ud. AI 101), ani ticket number airline-acher nodor dovornnek mhotvachem.
normalised: Ugddas dovrat ki antoraxttrik bhonvddekhatir, eorollain kampnink tanchim svotontr uddeanche kodd zatle, sadharonnponnim don akxoram uprant onnkanchi volleri (udharonn: E-Ai ek xembhar ani ek), ani ttokett nombor eorollainchea ttrekking ud'dexakhatir khub mhotvacho.

unnormalised: Ekaa vostuchek bilkul naka vishvas dhornnek tem asa tumchem PNR vo bookingache vivran ugddaasponan vantun gheunk, khas korun social mediaancher. Hem tumchea guptan vadha korunk xakta ani sambhavit kasak-ui tumchea bookingan lokhvunk provortoita. Tem gupit ani tumchea OTP sarkhem mhotvachem mhunn vichar kara.
normalised: ek vostu chukunk na oxem mhonnjek tumchem P-N-Ar vo buking vivron ubemponnan vanttum na, khas korun soshal midiyacher. Hem tumchi guptota komi korunk xokta ani somkaim tumchem bukingak tras diunk provas korttalo. Tem sodanch gupt dovrat. Tumchea O-Ti-Pi itle gupt ani mhotvachem mhonn chintat.

unnormalised: Techak lagun sodhaan: tumchem PNR, booking reference number vo Ticket ID surakshit dovora. Tem borovn dovora, tumchea fontan sambhall kara, kiteem-i tumka zai tem kara! Hea xir-xir codes tumche Bharotan bhonvddi kortana tumche uttam ixtt asat. Khuxealkayen bhonvddi kara, ani tumcho chai balistt ani uxer komi zanv! Tumkam tumche UPI transaction ID-achem screenshot kiteem-i zanvchen khatir bookingachik zago kiteim-i samballunk zai poddot.
normalised: mhonnun, ektr korun sangpak: tumchem P-N-Ar, buking reforens nombor, vo ttokett ai-ddi surkxit dovrat. Tem boroun dovrat, tumchea fonan save korat, kiteim korchem poddttlem tem korat! Him lhan kodd tumi bhartant bhonvddi kortana tumche borem ixtt zatat. Sukhi provas, ani tumchi kom'modd chha khub ghott ani tumchem der khub komi zaum! Toxench, tumi tumchea U-Pi-Ai tranzekshon ai-ddichem skreenxott kaddun tumchea bukingakhatir koxeai dovrun dovrunk zata kiteak zalear.
